resources.string: Luna is a 3-year-old male Golden Retriever. Friendly, loyal, and highly intelligent. He’s great with families and makes an excellent therapy dog. Loves playing fetch and morning walks.
Jake is a gentle 2-year-old Labrador. Calm and affectionate, she gets along well with children and other pets. She enjoys cuddles, belly rubs, and long naps in the sun.
Lucy is a smart and curious Border Collie. Just 1 years old, she’s quick to learn commands and loves mental games. A perfect partner for training, agility, or hiking.
Milo is a playful and social Beagle. At 2 years old, he’s full of charm and gets excited around people. Milo loves food, sniffing everything in sight, and making new friends.
Coco is a 5-year-old female Pomeranian with a big personality. Despite her small size, she’s brave and protective. Great for apartment living and loves being the center of attention.
Daisy is a calm and loyal Rottweiler. At 6 years old, he’s mature, obedient, and well-trained. Bruno is a great guardian and a gentle giant with those he trusts.
Rocky is a strong and energetic 4-year-old Husky. Always ready for an adventure, he thrives on outdoor activities and loves the snow. Needs an active owner to match his stamina.
Churro is a cheerful and friendly Cocker Spaniel. She’s 3 years old and loves attention. Daisy enjoys short walks, toys that squeak, and following you from room to room.
Waffles is a confident and adventurous Shiba Inu. Just turned 2, he’s independent but affectionate in his own way. He enjoys exploring the outdoors and climbing up to watch everything around him.
See more or less information about a dog.
